data.text:
Register Report for John Thompson

Generation 1

1. John Thompson-1 was born about 1789 in Yorkshire, England. He died in Ashton ? England.

Elizabeth was born about 1796 in Camberwell, Surrey, England..

John Thompson and Elizabeth married. They had the following children:

2. i. Joseph Thompson was born in 1828 in Camberwell, Surrey, England.. He married Sophia

Rees on 10 Dec 1862 in In the Weslean Methodist Chapel, Snargate Street, Dover, Kent,

England.

ii. Ann Thompson was born in 1820 in Camberwell, Surrey, England.

iii. William Thompson was born in 1821 in Camberwell, Surrey, England.

iv. Henry Thompson was born in 1823 in Camberwell, Surrey, England.

v. Elizabeth Thompson was born in 1826 in Camberwell, Surrey, England.

vi. Alfred Thompson was born in 1841 in Camberwell, Surrey, England.

Generation 2

2. Joseph Thompson-2 (John-1) was born in 1828 in Camberwell, Surrey, England..

Sophia Rees daughter of Rowland Rees and Sophia Sabine Broad was born on 07 Dec 1839 in

Gibralta, Spain. She died in Sep 1872 in Camberwell, Surrey, England at age 33..

Joseph Thompson and Sophia Rees were married on 10 Dec 1862 in In the Weslean Methodist

Chapel, Snargate Street, Dover, Kent, England. They had the following children:

i. Rowland Thompson was born in 1864 in Camberwell, Surrey, England. Born between

January and March. However his marriage certificate in 1921 gives his place of birth as

Preston, Lancashire, England.. He married Bridget Mary Gallagher on 25 Nov 1921 in St

Anne’s Church, Wellington South, New Zealand.

ii. Charles H Thompson was born in 1871 in Camberwell, Surrey, England.

3. iii. Sophia Lucy Thompson was born in 1864 in Camberwell, Surrey, England. She married

Ben Caudwell in Sep 1896 in Wandsworth, England.

4. iv. Allen Edward Thompson was born in 1869 in Camberwell, Surrey, England. He died in

1945 in Durban, South Africa.

Mary Jacob was born in 1846 in Sheperdswell, Dover. She died in 1890.

Joseph Thompson and Mary Jacob married. They had the following children:

i. Stewart Thompson was born in 1880 in Camberwell, Surrey, England.

ii. Perceval Thompson was born in 1881 in Camberwell, Surrey, England.
